name: Oddities & Commodities
description:
Welcome to your shop, shop owner! Here at Oddities & Commodities you can sell a wide variety of different artifacts! These wacky unique artifacts vary in size and price. As a shop owner your duty is to obtain these artifacts and then sell them to make a profit. You can do this by sending out your best henchmen to retrieve these items! While you send out henchmen on their adventures, it's your duty to barter and sell with the many customers that stop by your store. Be careful however, if you run out of money it's GAME OVER. Are YOU ready to take on the responsibilities of being the shop owner here at Oddities & Commodities?

Creators:

Carter Nelson - Artist

Declin Anderson - Programmer

John Samuelson - Programmer

Brandon Mennicke - Programmer

Note: If a customer does not leave the store after purchasing an item, click the cash register again. This will reinitiate the sale process. This will usually resolve the issue. We are currently working on fixing this bug.

We thank you for playing Oddities & Commodities! In the comments, please let us know of any bugs you have encountered while playing. Feedback is also always appreciated!
